# Route Planner Application

This is a full-stack web application for efficient delivery route planning and navigation integration.

## Project Structure
- Frontend: React with TypeScript for the user interface
- Backend: Node.js with Express for API and file processing  
- Features: CSV/spreadsheet upload, route optimization, Google Maps/Waze integration

## Key Components
- File upload system for delivery addresses
- Route optimization algorithms (TSP solver)
- Interactive mapping with turn-by-turn navigation
- Integration with external navigation apps

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement responsive design for mobile devices
- Follow REST API conventions for backend endpoints
- Use modern React patterns (hooks, functional components)
- Optimize for performance with large datasets
